column1: Uchi////Jeremy Parzen discussed his take on Uchi's wine list yesterday and so I will take a moment to extol the virtues of Uchi's Sake' list. There are solid choices across most price ranges and on our particular evening we chose the Otokoyama Tokubetsu Junmai - in 720ml bottle. This sake' was described on the menu as having the flavor of clean winter air. While the whimsy of this description was not lost on me
column2: the sake' itself was vibrant on the palate
column5: perpetual grip that carried the flavors of the fish and kept my fingers reaching for glass after glass.
